channel.title: CVE Feed for Fortinet -- Fortinet FSSO Windows DC Agent, FSSO Windows CA
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Fortinet -- Fortinet FSSO Windows DC Agent, FSSO Windows CA

item.title: CVE-2021-26088|2024-08-03T20:19:19.607Z -- fortinet -- fortinet%20fsso%20windows%20dc%20agent%2C%20fsso%20windows%20ca
item.description: An improper authentication vulnerability in FSSO Collector version 5.0.295 and below may allow an unauthenticated user to bypass a FSSO firewall policy and access the protected network via sending specifically crafted UDP login notification packets.
